name: Tel - Tur. GMTK 2020 Out Of Controll
name_original: Tel - Tur. GMTK 2020 Out Of Controll
description:
Tel-Tur is the Game no one asked for but when you play it. You’ll feel out of control.

 

Tel-Tur Is takes mechanics from the tower defense ad top down shooting genre and take key factors of those genres out of your control.

 

First as the main game play you can shoot at enemies who are on their way to the Base. Shoot them at all cost but beware where you are at any moment of time is OUT of your Control. you are connected to a malfunctioning teleporter. That will at random times teleport you a random location on the map

You can also decide to switch to map mode where you can choose to place turrets down depending on the money you have gained from killing enemies. But of course, where the towers get Placed is completely out of your control. So, go choose your tower it will not be useless, I hope.

To beat the game, you’ll need to get good at deciding which tower to buy when while shooting the enemies and assisting you already Placed turrets. Oh, And Good Luck on Keeping your head of where you are on the map.

  This is an entry to the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. All the Art, music, Sound effects and Art have been created by me during the Game Jam. I also Programmed everything for this entry as I was a solo Entry.

This is my First Game jam so please provide any feedback To tips and tricks you can.
